title: following provisions of the Higher Education Authority Act 2022 shall come
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Higher Education Authority Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Higher Education Authority Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited higher education authority act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: following provisions of the Higher Education Authority Act 2022 shall come
heading: 2. The 10th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 10th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Higher Education Authority Act 2022 shall come 
into operation: 

(a) 

sections 1 to 52; 

(b) 

section 53, other than subsection (1)(b); 

(c) 

section 60; 

(d) 

sections 64 to 68; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

(j) 

section 69 insofar as it relates to notices of appeal under section 
42(6) or 65(4); 

sections 70 to 84; 

sections 88 to 94; 

section 96; 

section 104; 

sections 106 to 140; 

(k) 

sections 142 to 145. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 November, 2022. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation 
and Science. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [554] 3
